item.title: Ready, set...
item.description: This site will give you most of what you need, but whenever there is a conflict between Canvas and this site, Canvas is the right one. Please alert me to conflicts, broken links or other mechanical issues as soon as possible via Slack. (Posting in #dj-sos Slack channel will ensure that everyone gets the answer, but you donâ€™t have to. ) I’ll be posting here from time to time with important announcements, but you’ll hear everything first in Slack.
